title: 怎么禁用基础指令
author: Svavlme
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Abraham511
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp Builder -essentuals.back
/mangaddp Builder -essentuals.tpa
/mangaddp Builder -essentuals.home


请务必采纳！！！

replies.author: 致于最初丶
replies.txt_content:
就只有这些吗，如果只有这些的话楼上的dalao说得对.

如果要完全禁用基础插件的所有命令
推荐使用PWP插件
(http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=274403&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D7%26searchoption%5B62%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E4%25B8%258D%25E5%2590%258C%25E4%25B8%2596%25E7%2595%258C%25E4%25B8%258D%25E5%2590%258C%25E6%258F%2592%25E4%25BB%25B6%26searchoption%5B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D)
